title: Learn R
text:
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: Part 1: Fundamentals
text: This section highlights the Fundamentals of programming in R

title: 1  Introduction
text: This Chapter discusses what R is, a brief history and why you might choose to program using R

title: 2  Setup
text: This chapter will discuss the basics of how to get setup with R, including downloading R and RStudio

title: Part 2: Data Analysis
text: This section discusses how to actually analyse data using R, including loading and saving data sets, as well as plotting

title: 3  Introduction
text: This chapter introduces the power of data analysis in R
